name: Smoke n Mirrors
description:
This game is best played on full screen mode. 

Smoke and Mirrors  was the product of a game jam, and as such, it was a rushed work, but it was a true product of love and camaraderie. 

The people who worked on this game: Sky, Areychan, and I, are really proud of it and we appreciate all the support and guidance we received from the Value Foundation, and the Culture Arcade Game Jam.
